channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Texas and California joust for political advantage, with Trump power and US House majority in play
item.description: Texas Democrats prevented their state’s House of Representatives from moving forward, at least for now, with a redrawn congressional map sought by President Donald Trump.

item.title: How a dispute over new Texas congressional maps highlights the nation’s history of gerrymandering
Tennessee readies for execution of man with working implanted defibrillator
